plugin.name: Queue Alarm
plugin.description: This plugin will highlight the waiting call timer of queue calls when they exceed a configurable treshold in seconds. This value can be set globally or per queue.
plugin.description-es_ES: Este complemento resaltará el contador de tiempo en llamados en espera que excedan un tiempo límite configurable. Ese valor puede ser global o individual por cola.
plugin.changelog: *1.0.2* Add Desktop notification and add option to toggle screen flash *1.0.1* Toggle use of configured SLA for queue as alarm. Toggle sound. *1.0.0* Stable release
